titleStmt.title: A wonder vvorth the reading, or, A true and faithfull relation of a woman, now dwelling in Kentstreet who, vpon Thursday, being the 21 of August last, was deliuered of a prodigious and monstrous child, in the presence of diuers honest, and religious women to their wonderfull feare and astonishment.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-streete,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
